bowt.hand.impl

Class BotReadyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bowt.hand.impl.BotReadyHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sx.blah.discord.api.events.IListener<sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.ReadyEvent>

    public abstract class BotReadyHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements sx.blah.discord.api.events.IListener<sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.ReadyEvent>
    A base handler for the ReadyEvent.

    An implementation of this class will listen to the ReadyEvent of the Bot that has been set.

    Once the event has been triggered the GuildOjects will be created by calling Bot.createGuildObjects(), the creators are loaded from the property file, the code in prepare() will be executed and Bot.setReady(boolean) is set to true.

    Author:
    ⋈
